name: Towaga 2
detailed_description:
TOWAGA 2 (previously called Inlight) is an action / shooter game where the sake of your tribe lies solely in your hands. Your focus, accuracy, and patience will be put to the ultimate test as you cleanse the world from its curse. Defeat legions of foes with your spells, upgrade your skills, unlock new abilities to fit your playstyle and delve into the mysterious past of the island of Az'kalar.

Only light must prevail, will you stand up to the challenge?

Key Features:

  • Immersive 2D graphics
  • Items, relics and spells to unlock
  • Challenging difficulty
  • Various game modes
  • A mysterious back-story
  • An original blend between genres
  • Runs smoothly in 60 FPS

short_description: TOWAGA 2 is a merciless action / shooter game where everything wants you dead. Only you can face the scourge and return light to the land.
